alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:11PM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Areas of blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 PM and 10 PM this evening of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Genesee, Potlatch, Plummer, and Moscow. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates of near an inch per hour are expected through late this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.
